des: "This is a recipe I have made for years and it is as popular now as it was the first time I made it. Using canned mushrooms allows it to be made ahead and kept in the fridge."
ins: Bring onion, vinegar, oil, sugar, and Dijon mustard to a boil in a saucepan. Add mushrooms and simmer until liquid is slightly reduced, 5 to 6 minutes. Transfer mixture to a covered container and chill. Drain before serving.
